Other cases result from new mutations in the gene and occur in people with no history of the disorder in their family.",GHR,Vohwinkel syndrome
What are the treatments for Vohwinkel syndrome ?,"These resources address the diagnosis or management of Vohwinkel syndrome:  - Genetic Testing Registry: Mutilating keratoderma  - Genetic Testin
